parameters.name: pattern-length
parameters.description: Size of the sliding window, independent of anomaly length, but should in the best case be larger.

parameters.name: latent
parameters.description: Size of latent embedding space. This space is the input for the PCA calculation afterwards.

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: Number of angles used to extract pattern nodes. A higher value will lead to high precision, but at the cost of increased computation time.

parameters.name: threads
parameters.description: Number of helper threads started besides the main thread. (min=1)

parameters.name: query-length
parameters.description: Size of the sliding windows used to find anomalies (query subsequences). query-length must be >= pattern-length!
